body:
## Release Notes

- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#82)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#81)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#78)
- TCP Nonce use is opposite to what's described in the spec @gjedeer (#63)
- Update spec.md with the latest merged changes. @iphydf (#75)
- Change travis language to rust because rustup seems to be broken. @iphydf (#74)
- Update DHT and onion sections with zugz' changes. @iphydf (#73)
- Update spec for https://github.com/TokTok/hs-toxcore/pull/150. @iphydf (#71)
- Update spec for https://github.com/TokTok/hs-toxcore/pull/145. @iphydf (#70)
- Update spec with the recent changes in hs-toxcore. @iphydf (#69)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#68)
- Fix Travis CI badge. @robinlinden (#53)
- Migrate to Pandoc 2. @iphydf (#67)
- Add check to ensure hs-toxcore and spec are in sync. @iphydf (#66)
- Update the spec with the latest text from hs-toxcore. @iphydf (#65)
- Fix travis builds of the docs @gjedeer (#64)
- Fix style in spec.md to stop Travis from failing. @robinlinden (#52)
- Add when enabled to part talking about local discovery @jhert0 (#48)
- Fix friend section after update of save format @robinlinden (#47)
- Minor fixups after the proof-reading PR. @iphydf (#46)
- Move "Text" to the Box section. @iphydf (#43)
- Replace old test section. @iphydf (#44)
- Add dht bootstrap info packet description. @iphydf (#45)
- Proofreading @SomeoneSerge (#42)
- Simplified KBucketNodes test. @iphydf (#38)
- Multiple fixes for the state format documentation @alexbakker (#37)
- Added test protocol specification. @iphydf (#32)
- K-buckets shouldn't be a subsection of Distance. @iphydf (#31)
- Add k-buckets specification. @iphydf (#30)
- Remove CLA badge. @iphydf (#29)
- Change margin-bottom to 'em' for consistency @ovalseven8 (#28)
- Add basic integer type representations to the intro. @iphydf (#27)
- Added a section detailing toxcore's state format @alexbakker (#26)
- Add pandoc autoformat rule to makefile. @iphydf (#24)
- Formatting @iphydf (#23)
- Clarified some things after review. @iphydf (#22)
- Rewrote part of the DHT sections on packet formats. @iphydf (#21)
- Add top level protocol packet description. @iphydf (#19)
- Rewrote the Distance text @iphydf (#18)
- Add build status and contributors badge @iphydf (#17)
- Add license @zetok (#16)
- Pull out the packed node format from the DHT. @iphydf (#15)
- Add introduction section and some more info on Crypto. @iphydf (#14)
- Formatting @iphydf (#13)
- Add Tox ID image @ovalseven8 (#10)
- fix lists - s/ [abcde]\./ -/ @zetok (#8)
- Add travis config and fix mdl (markdown lint) warnings @iphydf (#7)
- Remove unnecessary line @ovalseven8 (#6)
- fortmatting for TCP_connections section + small improvemetns to .css @zetok (#5)
- Generating HTML via rustdoc @zetok (#4)
- `TCP client` formatting @zetok (#3)
- fix error in `Send Nodes` about IPv6 length @zetok (#2)
- first run of refactoring `DHT` section @zetok (#1)
name: v0.1.0
